name: Argos (itch)
description:
A Incremental game that is a Spinoff of "The Last Fortress" Boardgame.  Inspired on the Incremental game "Crank" by FaeDine. Version: 0.43

GameDesign, Programming, and some graphics: Fabiano "Chikago" Saccol. This game wont be made if was not for the fans of "The Last Fortress" Boardgame. Thank you people for still believing. This game was made during COVID-19 Quarentine, so PLAY SAFE AND PLAY IN HOME. Good Luck to us, people.

Wanna help Translating and Correcting English error? (I´m not a native) Send me a email!
